Michael,

Thanks for your validation of this approach. I was able to call a 
private method by using method.setAccessible(true).
I agree that in general one should not test private methods, but when 
exceptions arise, this approach seems least intrusive. This is also 
an example of Active Code generation that many people are using these 
days.

Michael, I know that you have a fine commercial product. However I am 
looking for an open source implementation. If there are others on the 
list that have the same need please contact me.

Regards,

David
